gameRecap.title: Game Recap: 76ers 98, Heat 91
gameRecap.excerpt: Led by Tyrese Maxey's 30 points, eight rebounds and 10 assists, the 76ers defeated the Heat, 98-91. Kelly Oubre Jr. recorded 22 points, 11 rebounds and a career-high five blocks for the 76ers in the victory, while Bam Adebayo tallied 20 points, 13 rebounds and six assists for the Heat in the losing effort. The 76ers have won back-to-back games as they improve to 38-30 on the season, while the Heat fall to 37-31.
